# Read in the data 
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)

qc1 <- read_csv("/courses/EDS214/eds214-dammad-coders/data/raw_data/RawData/QuebradaCuenca1-Bisley.csv", na = c("-9999", "-9999.00", "-9999.0")) %>% 
  clean_names()

qc2 <- read_csv("/courses/EDS214/eds214-dammad-coders/data/raw_data/RawData/QuebradaCuenca2-Bisley.csv", na = c("-9999", "-9999.00", "-9999.0")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

# Clean/wrangle the data 
```{r}
qc1_clean <- qc1 %>% 
  select(sample_id, code, sample_date, k, no3) %>% 
  mutate(sample_date = lubridate::mdy(sample_date)) %>% 
  rename(k_mg_L = k, no3_ug_L = no3)

qc2_clean <- qc2 %>% 
  select(sample_id, code, sample_date, k, no3) %>% 
  mutate(sample_date = lubridate::mdy_hm(sample_date)) %>% 
  rename(k_mg_L = k, no3_ug_L = no3)

qc_combined <- rbind(qc1_clean, qc2_clean)
```

# Plotting the data 
```{r}
ggplot(data = qc_combined, aes(x = sample_date, y = k_mg_L))+
  geom_line(aes(color = sample_id))+
  theme_classic()
```
